title.narrative: Western Provinces Rural Water Supply, Sanitation and Hygiene Promotion Project

description.narrative: The project development objective is to increase access of poor participating communities to sustainable and equitable water supply, sanitation and hygiene promotion services by adopting an integrated and participatory approach.

participating-org.narrative: International Bank for Reconstruction and Development
International Bank for Reconstruction and Development

title.narrative: Increase in number of schools with access to improved sanitation services

comment.narrative: No further progress is expected in Shaanxi due to lack of funds.
Original target at Shaanxi 297Sichuan 195

title.narrative: Increase in number of schools with access to safe water supply

comment.narrative: No further progress is expected in Shaanxi due to lack of funds.
Original target at Shaanxi 297Sichuan 195

title.narrative: Increase in number of people with access to improved sanitation services

comment.narrative: Final figure to be updated in ICR.
Original target at Shaanxi 326,716Sichuan 337,289

title.narrative: Increase in percentage of people in project communities and schools who have adopted safe hygiene and sanitation behaviors.

comment.narrative: Final figure to be updated in ICR.
The final survey of Sichuan is still being compiled and should be submitted by late March 2013, however the targets are notexpected to be reached.

title.narrative: People provided with access to "improved sanitation facilities” under the proj.

comment.narrative: Final figure to be updated in ICR.
Original target at 664,005

title.narrative: Number of people in urban areas provided with access to Improved Water Sources under the project

comment.narrative: Final figure to be updated in ICR.
Original target at 771,109

title.narrative: Increase in number of people with access to safe water supply

baseline.value: To be set in participating communities when they enter the project (as stated in PAD).

comment.narrative: Final figure to be updated in ICR. EOP access target is likely to be met, but water quality in Sichuan to be verified.
Original target at Shaanxi 326,716Sichuan 444,393

title.narrative: Increase in percentage of households with improved latrines.

comment.narrative: No data in Sichuan due to delays in data collection and compliation.

title.narrative: Increase in percentage of households using safe water supply in participating communities.

comment.narrative: Sichuan's data is extracted from the mid-term survey report, Shaanxi submit project-end survey report

title.narrative: People provided with access to “improved sanitation facilities”- rural

comment.narrative: Final figure to be updated in ICR.
Original target at 664,005

title.narrative: Percentage of water supply schemes meeting operating sustainably after one year

comment.narrative: Final figure to be updated in ICR. Shaanxi's project-end survey shown 80% of WSS villages are getting technical support fromcountry govt
Shaanxi: 71.4%; Sichuan: 85.7%

title.narrative: Number of community garbage drop-off points and public latrines sustainably managed by communities

comment.narrative: No updated data from both.

title.narrative: Percentage of water supply systems meeting the tariff convenant after the first year of operations

comment.narrative: Both province's data is being compiled and should be reported by end March 2013.

title.narrative: Percentage of water supply systems meeting its full design supply capacity two years after construction completion.

comment.narrative: Both province's data is being compiled and should be reported by end March 2013.

title.narrative: Increase in percentages of community HWWS at 5 key occasions

comment.narrative: No data in Sichuan due to delays in data collection and compilation.

title.narrative: Increase in percentage of schools in project areas with improved latrines, hand washing facilities, soak-away systems and garbage drop-off points.

comment.narrative: No data in Sichuan due to delays in data collection and compilation.

title.narrative: Proportion of vulnerable households receiving and using safe water supply service

comment.narrative: No data in Sichuan due to delays in data collection and compilation.

title.narrative: Proportion of vulnerable households receiving and using improved sanitation services

comment.narrative: No data in Sichuan due to delays in data collection and compilation.

title.narrative: Number of WASH Committee managed Single Village and Cluster household water supply schemes working sustainably

comment.narrative: No updated data from both.

title.narrative: Number of WASH Committee members and percentage of women participating in training for capacity building

comment.narrative: No updated data from both.

title.narrative: Percentage of vulnerable households and women representatives in executive committee of WASH Committee

comment.narrative: No updated data from both.

title.narrative: Number of WASH Committees established by following principles and requirements set out by the project

comment.narrative: No updated data from both.

title.narrative: Number of meetings of WASH Committees

comment.narrative: No updated data from both.

title.narrative: Percent of spot-checks of schemes in which community needs have been satisfactorily reflected in project planning

comment.narrative: No updated data from both.

title.narrative: Percentage of Water Quality Certification of water supply scheme done on time.

comment.narrative: Only Shaanxi submit the routine water quality test data, and Sichuan is still collecting the routine water test data.

title.narrative: Increase in percentage of school children hand washing with soap (HWWS) after toilet use

comment.narrative: Sichuan's data is extracted from the mid-term survey report, Shaanxi submit project-end survey report

title.narrative: Increase in percentage of household disposal of feces of young children in a safe manner

comment.narrative: Sichuan's data is extracted from the mid-term survey report, Shaanxi submit project-end survey report

title.narrative: Average time saved by households in obtaining safe drinking water

comment.narrative: Sichuan's data is extracted from the mid-term survey report, only Shaanxi submit project-end survey report
